aicoach.title: AI Wellness Coach
aicoach.apiKeyMissing: An API Key for the AI service is not configured or could not be fetched. AI-powered features are currently unavailable.
aicoach.chatDisabledMissingKey: (Chat disabled due to missing API key)
aicoach.customPlanExample:
Here is your personalized plan:
1. Goal: Improve Sleep Quality. Action: Establish a consistent bedtime and wake-up time, even on weekends. Avoid caffeine and heavy meals 2-3 hours before bed.
2. Goal: Increase Daily Activity. Action: Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise 5 days a week. Start with a brisk 15-minute walk and gradually increase duration and intensity.
3. Goal: Practice Mindfulness. Action: Dedicate 10 minutes daily to meditation. Use guided meditations if you're new. Focus on your breath and acknowledge thoughts without judgment.
aicoach.error.fetchTip: Could not fetch daily tip at this moment.
aicoach.error.fetchAnalysis: Could not fetch weekly analysis now.
aicoach.error.fetchAnalysisNoData: No habit data logged yet to provide an analysis. Start logging your habits!
aicoach.error.fetchAnalysisNotEnoughData: Not enough data from the past week for an analysis. Keep logging!
aicoach.error.chatResponse: Sorry, I'm having trouble responding right now. Please check your connection or try again later.
aicoach.error.fetchPlan: Sorry, I couldn't generate a custom plan right now. Please try again.

profile.dataStorageInfo: Your habit data, profile, and preferences are stored locally in your web browser's storage. Clearing your browser's site data for VitalFlow will remove all your information.
profile.futureUpdatesInfo: Future updates may include cloud synchronization, data export, and account management features.
